group_1.narration: In order to figure out how to return to our world,@we needed to interview the student body…@So we went undercover in a local school to undergo@that authentic transfer student experience!

group_1.textRight: Now then, please introduce yourselves.

group_1.textLeft: My name is Takina Inoue.@It's nice to meet you.
I'm Chisato Nishikigi!@Let's get to know each other!
Oh, and! And! I absolutely love gossip,@so tell me all the juicy details!

group_1.textRight: Hm… So these are the guys investigating@[textBlue:Rumors]?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, this is Chisato and Takina. The girls I told@you about through the contact network.
Um… Does that mean you're a Magical Girl, too?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I've also had a [textBlue:Rumor] get me in hot water.
…So,  you're looking for a [textBlue:Rumor] to get you@back to your world?
Do you know anything about it?

group_1.textLeft: I'm asking Tsuruno and her friends for help@gathering info from the high school.
We're thinking of going around the middle@school.

group_1.textRight: I see…

group_1.textLeft: Well then, let's go and ask around together,@Rena!

group_1.textRight: Huh? No, I'm—!

group_1.textLeft: Whaaat? I thought all the [textBlue:Rumors] were gone?

group_1.textCenter: Oh, do you wanna gossip about normal rumors?@I don't really know any…

group_1.textRight: …Uh, by the way, maybe you've heard of…

group_1.narration: "...I think Rika and the others were talking@about something…outside…Kamihama…"
"I know that one!@It's a hot topic among Magical Girls!@I heard that if you follow specific steps,@you might be able to go to another world!@Isn't that like super crazy?!"
"They say that at twilight,@if you open a door on a certain rooftop,@you'll find another world on the other side...@Can such a storybook legend really exist?"

group_1.textLeft: Heeey! Irohaaa! Renaaa!
Oh, Kaede's here too.

group_1.textRight: Rena grabbed me while they were walking@around, so I got dragged along…
She's shy all by herself.

group_1.textLeft: You're SO annoying!
Ahaha…@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]So, you guys are the ones who...?

group_1.textRight: Yes, Momoko… That's correct.@Thank you for your cooperation.

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it!@Anyways, how did it go over here?
Rumors of a rooftop leading to another world…@We heard just the same thing.

group_1.textRight: Is that the same world we came from?
Well, we have no idea if they're connected yet.

group_1.textLeft: More importantly, we don't even know where@that rooftop is.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah, that's the thing…@The rumors say it's out of town…
…How troublesome. So do we just try every@single rooftop we can find?

group_1.textLeft: No way we're doing that!
We'll just have to do some investigative@interviewing after school!

group_1.textRight: …[wait:0.8][chara:406201:cheek_0][chara:406201:face_mtn_ex_040.exp3.json][chara:406201:lipSynch_1]That's just what you want to do, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]The things we want to do gotta come first,@after all! *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: …There's no stopping you when you get like this.

group_1.textLeft: I mean, if we've come out all the way to another@world, we ought to do some sightseeing.
Oh yeah, you guys don't have to go through@all the trouble of joining us.

group_1.textRight: Erm… But won't you get lost?

group_1.textLeft: We've got Kurumi with us, so we're all good!

group_1.narration: "Ahh, so I'm just your navigator then."

group_1.textRight: Hmm… But things would get bad if a Witch@struck again.

group_1.textLeft: Well I'll accompany you two, then!

group_1.textRight: You... We can't just have Chisato's whims@drag you around like that...

group_1.textLeft: But if you're going to talk with Magical Girls,@I think it's better to have a familiar face…
If you go around askin' about [textBlue:Rumors] and stuff,@it'll put people on edge.

group_1.textRight: …You certainly have a point.

group_1.textLeft: That settles that, then!
Iroha, everyone, you guys go ask Nemu about@any [textBlue:Rumors] that could be involved!
Word says it's a rooftop outside the city, so it@might not be a [textBlue:Rumor]…but just in case.

group_1.textRight: Yeah…!@Understood!

group_1.textLeft: And we'll be asking around about everything, too.

group_1.textRight: Thank you! You guys are so helpful!@Alright, let's go, Tsuruno!
Oh, hang on a second!
[textBlue:Rumors] are supposed to only affect Kamihama,@so I assumed you wouldn't be leaving town.
But if you do head outside the city, there's@something you need to watch out for…
